scripts.install-govuk-theme: cd web/themes/contrib/govuk_theme && npm install && node_modules/.bin/gulp build
scripts.install-par-theme: cd web/themes/custom/par_theme && npm install && node_modules/.bin/gulp build
scripts.update-govuk-theme: cd web/themes/contrib/govuk_theme && npm update && node_modules/.bin/gulp build
scripts.update-par-theme: cd web/themes/contrib/par_theme && npm update && node_modules/.bin/gulp build
scripts.update-frontend: npm update && npm run update-govuk-theme && npm run install-par-theme
scripts.frontend: npm i && npm run install-govuk-theme && npm run install-par-theme
